# FILMORE Gear Inventory â€” Complete Reference

> A touring production management web app for tracking, managing, and updating gear inventory across crew members, with approval workflows and fly pack logistics.

---

## Site Overview

- **URL:** https://filmore-gear.vercel.app
- **Author:** FiL Hash
- **Contact:** filhashmore@protonmail.com
- **GitHub:** https://github.com/filhashmore/filmore-gear
- **X/Twitter:** https://x.com/FiLHashDev
- **Location:** Nashville, Tennessee
- **Type:** Single-page PWA with access code protection
- **Stack:** React 18 (CDN), Tailwind CSS, Lucide Icons, Babel (in-browser transpilation), localStorage
- **Hosting:** Vercel (with security headers: CSP, HSTS, XSS protection, X-Frame-Options)
- **PWA:** Yes (manifest.json, apple-touch-icon, standalone mode with iOS safe area support)
- **Theme:** Dark theme (#0a0a0a background, neutral grays, amber accent)

## Navigation

This is a single-page app. All sections are accessed via tab navigation at the root URL.

| Section | Tab | Description |
|---------|-----|-------------|
| Dashboard | LayoutDashboard | Stats overview, maintenance alerts, ASAP acquisitions |
| Inventory | Package | Full gear catalog across all owners |
| Consumables | Zap | Expendable supplies with purchase links |
| Acquisitions | ShoppingCart | New gear needs with approval workflow |
| FLY Pack | Plane | Crew baggage assignments for fly dates |

---

## Dashboard

### Overview Stats
- **Total Items**: Count of all inventory items across FILMORE, Joel, Reid, and Drew
- **Needs Maintenance**: Items flagged with Maintenance status
- **Consumables Needed**: Items with Needed or Need Soon status
- **Pending Acquisitions**: Items awaiting management/artist approval
- **ASAP Items**: Acquisitions flagged as Acquire ASAP

### Quick Actions
- Clicking maintenance alerts navigates to filtered Inventory view
- Clicking ASAP items opens acquisition detail modal
- Search bar auto-navigates to Inventory section when focused

---

## Inventory Management

### Item Properties
- **ID**: Unique identifier (e.g., 001, 202, 300)
- **Name**: Gear item name
- **Status**: Good, Maintenance, Damaged, Unknown
- **Show Type**: DRIVE (truck/trailer), FLY (airline), FLY/DRIVE (both), Storage
- **Pack Location**: Where the item lives (Hardware, Camo Bag, M32 Peli, Floating, etc.)
- **Owner**: FILMORE (band-owned), Joel, Reid, Drew (personal gear)
- **Stock**: Quantity count
- **Price**: Value if known
- **Notes**: Free-text notes

### Filtering & Sorting
- Filter by status (All, Good, Maintenance, Damaged, Unknown)
- Filter by owner (All, FILMORE, Joel, Reid, Drew)
- Search across name, ID, notes, and pack location
- Click any column header to sort ascending/descending

### Color-Coded Badges
- **Show Types**: DRIVE (blue), FLY (sky), FLY/DRIVE (violet), Storage (gray)
- **Pack Locations**: Each location has a unique color for quick visual identification
- **Statuses**: Good (emerald), Maintenance (amber), Damaged (red), Unknown (gray)
- **Owners**: FILMORE (amber), Joel (blue), Reid (emerald), Drew (purple)

### Owner Gear Breakdown
- **FILMORE**: Band-owned gear (Hardware Case, Camo Bag, Wireless Mic Peli, etc.)
- **Joel**: Drums, monitors, playback, lighting (M32 Peli, IEM Peli, Drum Cases, etc.)
- **Reid**: Electric guitars, pedalboard, amp (EGT 01, EGT 02, Pedalboard)
- **Drew**: FOH equipment, monitors iPad, cable tester, printer, backup IEMs

---

## Consumables

### Categories
- **Tape**: Black gaff, electrical, spike tape, clear masking
- **Batteries**: Duracell Procell AA (24-pack), 9V (12-pack)
- **Audio**: 25ft FOH XLRs, cables
- **Band**: Guitar strings, spare supplies

### Status Types
- **Full Stock**: Fully stocked, no action needed
- **Needed**: Must purchase before next run
- **Need Soon**: Running low, plan to reorder
- **Additional**: Nice to have, not urgent

### Features
- Direct purchase links (Amazon, Sweetwater) for each item
- Quantity needed tracking
- Price per unit/pack

---

## Acquisitions

### Approval Workflow
1. **Production Manager** adds items with details (rent/own, pricing, notes, product links)
2. **Management** reviews and approves or denies
3. **Artist** can also review and approve/deny
4. Role switching via dropdown in the Acquisitions tab

### Item Properties
- **Rent/Own**: Rental, Own, or Rental+Own classification
- **Status**: Acquire ASAP, Needed, In the works, Additional, Un-Necessary, Acquired
- **Buy Price / Rental Cost**: Pricing information
- **Category**: Audio, Band, Tour, Lighting
- **Approval**: Pending, Approved, Denied
- **Product Links**: Direct links to products (supports multiple comma-separated links)
- **Notes**: Context and justification

### Multi-Link Support
Items can have multiple product links displayed as numbered links (#1, #2, #3, etc.). Links are comma-separated in the data.

### Key Acquisition Categories
- **Audio**: FOH snakes, Apollo interface, PSE unit, RTA mic, power conditioners, screen mounts
- **Band**: Wireless mics, guitar tech workstation, wired earpack, pick holders, capos
- **Tour**: Radios, trailer straps, load bars, drum covers, laminates
- **Lighting**: Power extensions for upstage lighting

---

## FLY Pack

### Crew Members
- **Joel**: Drums, monitors, playback, lighting tech
- **Drew**: FOH engineer, monitors
- **Reid**: Guitar tech
- **Tyler**: Drums, acoustic guitar
- **Guest**: Overflow/guest assignments

### Features
- **Person Cards**: Visual grid showing each person's checked bags and carry-ons
- **Search Highlighting**: Search matches highlight the person card with a colored ring and pin icon, matching items highlighted in amber
- **Editable Assignments**: Dropdown selects for checked bag and carry-on per item
- **Sortable Table**: Full list view with sortable columns

### Typical FLY Pack Items
- M32 Peli (Joel - checked)
- IEM Peli (Joel - checked)
- Playback Peli (Joel - carry-on)
- Cables Peli (Drew - checked)
- EGT Pedalboard (Reid - checked)
- Snare Case (Tyler - checked)
- Cymbals Case (Reid - checked)
- EGT 01 (Reid - carry-on)
- FILMORE Acoustic GTR (Tyler - carry-on)
- Green Peli (Drew - carry-on)

---

## Architecture

- **Single HTML file**: All React components, data, and styles in one `index.html`
- **No build step**: Uses CDN-loaded React, Babel (in-browser transpilation), and Tailwind CSS
- **Data persistence**: Browser localStorage (device-specific, not synced across users)
- **Initial data**: Hardcoded in `INITIAL_DATA` object, merged with localStorage on load
- **Defensive data loading**: Merges saved data with initial data to handle missing/corrupted arrays
- **PWA**: manifest.json for home screen installation, standalone display mode
- **Performance**: DNS prefetch, preconnect, preloaded critical resources, pinned library versions for caching
- **Loading screen**: Branded FILMORE loading state shown while scripts download

---

## Access & Authentication

| Access | Method | Description |
|--------|--------|-------------|
| Site Entry | Access code | Required to view any content |
| PM View | Default | Full edit access to all sections |
| Management View | Role switch | Approve/deny acquisitions |
| Artist View | Role switch | Approve/deny acquisitions |

Access code required. Contact admin for credentials.

---

## Security

- Content Security Policy (CSP) restricting scripts, styles, fonts, images
- HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) with preload
- X-Frame-Options: DENY (prevents iframe embedding)
- X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
- XSS Protection enabled
- Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin
- Permissions-Policy restricting device APIs

---
